page.title: 03Stuart and Michael's Father
page.content: Stuart and Michael's father is a painter and decorator around Pateley. On Tuesday, 18th June, he got up at 7.30am. As usual, he did not have any breakfast. At 8.00am he left for work. He then went around to his workshop in Millfield Street, where he collected his painting materials. He then went to Smelthouses, near Pateley, in his car. He was to decorate some rooms in a house there. His first task was to paint the ceiling of the kitchen. When that had dried, he gave it another coat of paint. After that, he painted the kitchen walls. When he had finished, he ate his packed lunch. Next he painted a large hall ceiling and when he had finished that job, he cleaned up his paint brushes and gathered up his dustsheets. He came home at about 5.00pm for his tea.
